sections.text: Grower, defined.Grower shall mean any landowner personally engaged in growing corn, a tenant of the landowner personally engaged in growing corn, and both the owner and tenant jointly and shall include a person, partnership, limited liability company, association, corporation, cooperative, trust, sharecropper, and other business unit, device, and arrangement.SourceLaws 1978, LB 639, ยง 5;Laws 1993, LB 121, ยง 72.
